replies.body: I think Rito has gone way too far of nerfing {{champion:76}} . First they buff her. I think thats very nice. And then it was just nerfs after nerfs after nerfs for her. First they nerf her AD, Which is understandable since her ad nid was so crazy. but then they nerfed her jungle potential into the skillshot hit mark, nerf her hp completely. Now they're nerfing her spear and w?? wtf.

This isht is getting out of hand. Nerfing "popular" champs isnt gonna do anything. How about reworking / buffing "unpopular" champs, to bring them back into the game? put more time and energy into that!!!!!!! and people know exactly who im talking about.

Teemo has been nerfed for sure, I mean half time shrooms without any compensation(for shrooms) is like halving any other champs ulti. The other changes he has needed anyway for overall update. If they half time the shroom duration, at least bring the CD down on them and let him carry double the amount! Seriously, its the only thing he's got late game because assassins can take him out in 2 hits, and then he is totally useless if they all get oracles, so WTF RIOT!!!!!!!
he has been always useless...

I strongly disagree with the reduction in Teemo's schroom noxious-trap duration from 10 minutes to 5 minutes... this is too extreme.. Teemo has always needed a slight buff - everyone knew that. But scattering his schrooms around the map - and getting the odd kill when Teemo is not even in the fight (I.E. a fleeing enemy on low who runs over one)has been a part of his somewhat limited team utility.  Halving the time that schrooms remain on the map reduces this likelihood somewhat, and is not compensated with the very small buff to the schroom, which is realistically already countered by the INCREASE in arming time, which means it's harder to get involved in team fights.  My main objection is the halving of the duration of schooms.  I think overall it hurts a weak champion more than the slight buffs he received.  The other changes I can accept, but reducing the duration is very, very harsh on Teemo, particularly now that people can use Sweeper Lenses (or pink wards) to clear his schrooms.  I humbly ask that this duration time be reconsidered.

I personally think that the new HUD is okay, you just need to get use to it like anything else. HOWEVER where are the chroma packs... I haven't gotten them in the update? or is there another short update yet to come?

One of my favourite items in the game is stinger but it currently doesn't have many build options and the options it does have aren't really very suited to the item. It's an item for tanks or for mid game because it requires you to already have damage to use it. The attack speed is underwhelming if you don't have ad or aren't an on hit tank and the cdr isn't that great if you don't have damage items yet or aren't someone who doesn't need damage to be useful. I think that wit's end should build out of stinger instead of the recurve bow because wit's end is also in the same spot as stinger in that it's an item best suited for tanks but with not enough incentive behind it for tanks. It has natural damage that is strongest in the early and mid game but it's build path isn't good enough or give enough utility/defence for tanks to get and doesn't scale well enough for carries to get. Also sated devourer champs don't want to get it because by the time they have sated devourer the item is redundant. I think the item would be much more useful and fit it's niche better while also giving my favourite item more options if it gave 10% cdr and built out of stinger instead of recurve bow. Also negatron cloak doesn't have many options right now either so stinger plus negatron would be a cool build path. Just my 2 cents though :P
tl;dr Change wit's end recipe to be stinger + negatron cloak instead of recurve bow + null magic mantle + dagger.

I find it funny how people are complaining about Nidalee nerfs, when even now she'll still be a significant carry into the mid-late game. Look at a champion like Kassadin, who has seen nothing but nerfs to his kit that's been woefully underpowered ever since his rework. Then they just keep nerfing, just keep nerfing. Now is NOT the time to listen to Dory Rito, cmon! Give Kassadin some love, he was my favourite mid laner, now he's almost completely unplayable.
